text: Get rid of the `hubfs` in the url of assets.
We could be using service workers but can't because of this.
alternatively, could also just add the `Service-Worker-Allowed` http header: <https://www.w3.org/TR/service-workers-1/#extended-http-headers>

service workers are coming to windows and iOS this year (already on Chrome/android) which means websites will have the ability to work just like native apps... e.g. offline support, push notifications, extremely performant, background downloading, etc.. it would be awesome if we can use them on HubSpot :slightly_smiling_face:
Is there a way where we can get the Variables that are stored for a blog posts tags to be in the same order for which they entered into the backend post settings?
the point behind it would be giving us the ability to have something tagged with the main tag first and then additional tags after. Then we could always pull the main tag if needed.
Cant you just look for the last one?
